review:
Good pediatrician is a boon for working mothers. I have been visiting Dr vineeta Rajput ,a renouned pediatrician in New Delhi for my elder daughter for the last 4 years.
she is  a  very caring and friendly doctor. She always gives the right and valuable consultation. Over a period of time I have developed such a faith in her that now  even though I am out of delhi I am taking videoconsultation for my newborn  baby and got satisfactory results. I highly recommend her for best diagnosis and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited Dr  Vineeta  Rajput's clinic many times for my son and he  always recovered quickly  .she is extremely kind *** ** ********* *******
During this lockdown  I took videoconsultation also  from her and 
I am so thankful to have such a wonderful child specialist in my vicinity .She is a boon to my son.
I took my daughter to Dr. Vineeta, ma'am experience was very good, she looked after my daughter very well and now my daughter is fine.

*** ** ***** ****** * **** **** ***** She vaccinated my baby with old influenza vaccination. My 10 month baby suffering from fever and she gave tetnus injection to her although baby already got tetnus in her immunity schedule without concerning us.
The diagnosis process and treatment for the same is remarkable. Step by step clarification was also provided.
****** ******* ******* she listen carefully to each and every problem & explain complete details of diagonosis. Whenever I went to her for my girl child, she got better almost instantly..
